spec.name: La Galerie 38
spec.description: Founded in 2010 in Casablanca by Fihr Kettani and Mohammed Chaoui El Faiz, La Galerie 38 has become a major reference in Moroccan contemporary art. Based initially in Casablanca at the Studio des Arts Vivants, it expanded to Marrakech in 2023 (Gueliz district), and opened a new space in Geneva in 2025. The gallery exhibits Moroccan and international artists, seeks to foster artistic dialogue across cultures, generations and forms of expression.

people.comment: Co-founder of La Galerie 38, passionate about contemporary art.
Partner leading the Geneva branch of La Galerie 38.
